not_found: Can't find an answer? Message us on Telegram.

what_is_aibro.question: What is AIBRO Business?
what_is_aibro.answer: AIBRO Business is an ecosystem of AI tools for automating small and medium business, fully integrated into Telegram. We help automate content creation, customer communication, booking and other routine tasks.

why_telegram.question: Why Telegram?
why_telegram.answer: Telegram is not just a messenger. It's a full business platform with channels, groups, bots and built-in payments. 70% of Russian businesses already use Telegram to communicate with customers. We make this work automatic.
